```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(xml2)

```

```{r}
# chicago crime
web = "http://crime.chicagotribune.com/chicago/community#property-table"

Crimedf = read_html(web) %>% 
  html_nodes(".community-area-rankings .table") %>% 
  html_table(fill = TRUE) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  select(Community.area.2, Arson, Theft, Burglary, Motor.vehicle.theft)



```
